H0.text: Earth making a complete rotation takes about one year to complete.

H1.text: The Moon making a complete rotation around the Earth takes about one year to complete.

H2.text: Earth revolving completely around the Sun takes about one year to complete.

H3.text: The Moon revolving completely around Earth takes about one year to complete.

A4.text: One complete orbit takes 365.256 days (1 sidereal year), during which time Earth has traveled 940 million km (584 million mi).
